ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Theodore E. Margeson ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. THEODORE E. MARGESON, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective August 15, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
